ref.mixed-citation: The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC). Report on global warming of 1.5 ͦ C above pre-industrial levels and related greenhouse gas pathways (2018) Summary for Policymakers. In: Global Warming of 1.5°C.
